tool_description: The Web Blend API is in Beta at the moment, but we're looking for developers and designers to try it out and help us work out the kinks. You'll need to request an API key to be able to use it. The v1 API responses are returned in JSON format and all of the queries are read-only. All requests must be prefaced by http://api.thewebblend.com/.
name: thewebblend
title: thewebblend

api_list.name: posts contents of user
api_list.description: Returns the content for a user (accepts the same filter arguments as contents API query)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://baskarm28-thewebblend-v1.p.rapidapi.com/services/v1/users/:id/contents"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "baskarm28-thewebblend-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
